## Example of TSV file to convert in VCF
#CHROM	POS	ALT	END	1nci60	Ref
7	55241755	A	55241755	0.0082	G
7	55242482	T	55242482	0.0082	C
7	55242487	T	55242487	0.016	C

7	55248965	T	55248965	0.0082	C

7	55249063	A	55249063	0.66	G
7	55249102	T	55249102	0.0082	C
7	55249102	T	55249102	0.0082	C
7	70255242	A	70255242	0.0082	G
